# Main goal
--

### How can a strength-based intervention in schools foster school engagement and peers relationships ?

--

- Character strengths as proposed by Peterson and Seligman (VIA institute)
--

- Interventions adapted with the teacher and teached by the teacher.
--

- Engagement as a predictor of students outcomes (e.g. Fredricks)
--

- Relationships as part of what leads to a good classroom climate (e.g. Gaudreau)
--

- Classroom climate as a variable of interest in special education especially in inclusive settings.
